methods.description: Added phone_number as a new attribute to the user creation request.
Added phone_number as a new attribute to the user update request.
Added phone_number to the user response object.

non_breaking_changes.description: The phone_number attribute was added to UserCreateRequest, UserUpdateRequest, and UserResponse models, allowing users to provide their phone numbers during creation and updates.
reasoning: The addition of a new attribute (phone_number) to existing API requests (UserCreateRequest, UserUpdateRequest) and responses (UserResponse) does not disrupt the existing functionality.
Existing clients using the API will not be affected as they can continue to function without providing the phone_number, making it an optional field.
This change enhances the API by allowing additional user information without breaking existing contract.
